jumpingalien.model

Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • jumpingalien.model.GameObject
      • jumpingalien.model.Plant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Skullcab, Sneezewort

    public abstract class Plant
extends GameObject
    This class builds a Plant with Hit Points as health and with an age
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Seppe Lesschaeve (Informatica)

      • Plant

        @Model
protected Plant(int pixelLeftX,
                       int pixelBottomY,
                       int point,
                       jumpingalien.util.Sprite... sprites)
        This constructor will set the initial Pixel Position, Actual Position, HitPoint and the images to show the animation
        Parameters:
        pixelLeftX - This parameter is used as the x-coordinate of the Pixel Position
        pixelBottomY - This parameter is used as the y-coordinate of the Pixel Position
        sprites - This parameter is used as images to show the animation
        Effect:
        ...
            super(pixelLeftX, pixelBottomY, sprites)
        Postcondition:
        ...
            this.hitPoint = new HitPoint(point, 0, point)

        Specified by:
